page.title: 07CHILDREN 1.A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content:
I wake at about 07:30 hrs. Sunlight streams through the curtains.I retreat under the covers. Eventually I get up to find out the time. Mum and dad are still asleep. I walked back to my bedroom to read my book-The Diddakio. At 08:05 hrs mum's alarm rings and put on my sun dress. I run down stairs and set the table for breakfast.Mum comes down later. She collects croissants from the freezer to the oven. Dad and my sister wake up while I finish eating. After I practise music. Then I go out to play untill lunch. I finish lunch then practise violin. I play again until tea. After tea I go to Sunday club with friends. I come home at 19:30 hrs. Have supper later, read then go to sleep at 21:00 hrs.
{Suzanne aged 10}
